backend/main.mo: Main actor defining order management system with types for orders, design mappings, and karigars; includes functions for saving orders, supplying orders (splitting quantities), managing karigars and design mappings, and blob storage integration via MixinStorage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old PersistentOrder records to new Order records by adding nullable genericName and karigarName fields while preserving all other order data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: RB order quantity splitting with supply dialog, PDF export fixes for iPhone/iOS Safari, and design image embedding in Karigar detail page exports.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, dashboard tabs with filtering/search, order ingestion with batch processing, master design management, and karigar detail views with export functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements including sidebar, charts, and semantic tokens using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Jewellery Order Management System with viewport meta tag and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with eight routes (dashboard, ingest, unmapped, master designs, design images, tag printing, barcode scanning, karigar detail), QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and sidebar layout.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Custom: Tab component displaying only CO-type orders with Pending status, featuring search functionality by order number using client-side filtering with useMemo.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Design: Modal component for displaying design images with zoom and pan functionality, supporting both mouse and touch interactions. Fetches design image data using a custom hook and provides controls for zooming in/out and navigating the image.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Hallma: Tab component displaying hallmark orders with filtering by order type (CO/RB), karigar name, order number search, and date range. Uses OrderTable to render filtered results and manages multiple filter states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Kariga: Tab component showing pending orders grouped by karigar name with summary cards displaying total orders and weight per karigar. Clicking a karigar card navigates to a detailed view of that karigar's orders.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Reusable table component for displaying orders with optional bulk selection, design image preview, and export functionality (Excel, PDF, JPEG). Supports marking orders as ready with special handling for RB-type orders requiring supply information.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/ReadyT: Tab component displaying orders with 'Ready' status, featuring filters for order type, karigar name, order number search, and date range. Similar structure to HallmarkTab but specifically filters for ready orders.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Summar: Dashboard component displaying four summary cards showing total orders, total weight, total quantity, and customer orders count. Fetches all orders and calculates aggregate statistics with loading states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Suppli: Dialog component for entering supplied quantities for RB orders before marking them as ready. Handles single order input validation and batch processing for multiple orders.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalO: Dashboard tab displaying pending and returned orders with filters for order type, karigar, and search. Triggers SuppliedQtyDialog for RB orders when marking as ready.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Unmapp: Alert banner component that displays unmapped design codes with missing generic names or karigar mappings, providing navigation to fix them.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Collapsible sidebar navigation component with menu items for dashboard, order ingestion, master designs, tag printing, and barcode scanning.
frontend/src/components/masterdesigns/Ed: Modal dialog for editing design-to-karigar mappings with ability to select existing karigars or add new ones, reassigning pending orders on save.
frontend/src/components/tagprinting/Webv: Full-screen modal dialog that embeds an external MPN system URL in an iframe with loading state and sandboxed permissions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders, karigars, design mappings, and images with various filters (status, type, karigar) and bulk operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining color schemes for UI components including gold accents, sidebar styling, and interactive element transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/BarcodeScanning.tsx: Implements barcode scanning functionality supporting both hardware scanners (via keyboard events) and camera-based QR scanning, with bulk order status updates and visual feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with tabs for viewing total orders, ready orders, hallmark orders, customer orders, karigars, and unmapped orders with summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/DesignImages.tsx: Handles bulk design image uploads from folders or ZIP files, extracting design codes from filenames and uploading images in batches with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/IngestOrders.tsx: Handles Excel file upload for bulk order ingestion, parsing orders in batches and saving them via the backend actor while displaying progress and validation errors.
frontend/src/pages/KarigarDetail.tsx: Displays detailed view of orders assigned to a specific karigar with export functionality (PDF/JPEG) and ability to mark orders as ready or supply quantities for RB-type orders.
frontend/src/pages/MasterDesigns.tsx: Manages master design mappings by uploading Excel files containing design-to-karigar assignments, automatically creating karigars and reassigning existing orders to newly mapped karigars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPrinting.tsx: Provides interface for printing tags for ready orders via MPN system integration, requiring login through an embedded webview before processing orders.
frontend/src/pages/UnmappedCodes.tsx: Lists design codes from orders that lack generic name or karigar assignments, allowing inline editing to manually map unmapped design codes.
frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts: Parses Excel files for order data and master design data, normalizing design codes to uppercase and trimming whitespace for consistent matching. Processes data in chunks to avoid UI blocking and validates required fields.
frontend/src/utils/exportUtils.ts: Exports orders to Excel and PDF formats, with PDF export grouping orders by design code (sorted numerically), fetching design images from backend, and handling iOS-specific rendering issues. Includes base64 image conversion and HTML-to-PDF generation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, font families (Inter and Playfair Display), and extended theme properties including sidebar, chart, and gold color variants.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing known issues (Ready tab status filtering, iPhone PDF export, design image exports) and pending feature requests for RB order splitting and export enhancements in an inventory management system.
